recommended_degree: Teknologi Rekayasa Pengelolaan Dan Pemeliharaan Bangunan Sipil, Teknologi Rekayasa Dan Pemeliharaan Bangunan Sipil, Teknik Sipil, Teknik Pengelolaan dan Pemeliharaan Infrastruktur Sipil, Teknik Infrastruktur Sipil dan Perancangan Arsitektur (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability:
a.	Prepare for all technical plans/drawings utilising Cabinet Vision/Woodwop software system.
b.	Ensure conformance with specification and standards in processing customer orders.
c.	Break down product information into components and bills of materials, applying accurate material codes and sizes.
d.	Provide technical support and guidance to the internal and external customers.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Majalengka, West Java.
b.	Fluent in English, both written and spoken. 
c.	Min.D3 from any major, preferably Engineering. 
d.	Preferably able to interpret technical drawings, blueprints, and specifications.
e.	Familiar with AutoCAD, Revit, Cabinet Vision/Woodwop, or other Building Information Modeling software.
